description: Dell's Alienware 34, the AW3425DW model in particular, is a great deal at the moment as it is lowest ever priced. This is a 34 inch 1440p 240 Hz curved gaming monitor. Read more...
title: Dell's Alienware 34 240Hz QD-OLED ultrawide 1440p Curved Gaming Monitor hits lowest price

description: Microsoft has revealed a new feature that may make the lives of many document authors using PowerPoint and Word a lot easier. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces potential game-changer feature for Word and PowerPoint

description: Even though many Microsoft customers think that the new Outlook app is "hot garbage", the company wants partners to turn the tide. Read more...
title: Microsoft really wants partners to use the new Outlook, offers free service for transition

description: Microsoft has highlighted the "remarkable" adoption of SQL Server 2025 on Linux, along with some new features. Read more...
title: Microsoft says SQL Server adoption on Linux is 'phenomenal', ends support for SUSE distro

description: Experience universal, productive and fast! Get all the powerful tools that master your PDF across all platforms and save $90. Read more...
title: UPDF Pro lifetime subscription is now just $59.99

description: Microsoft has released a new bug-fixing update for Windows 11 version 26H1 with build 28000.1199 now available in the Canary Channel. Read more...
title: Windows 11 26H1 gets a bunch of fixes in new build 28000.1199

description: Google is experimenting with a new feature that lets you share videos in YouTube app on iOS and Android. Read more...
title: YouTube experiments with messaging and video sharing inside its app

description: We are in the last quarter of the year, and Google has published the best Android apps and games on Google Play for 2025. Read more...
title: Google announces the best Android apps and games awards for 2025

description: A practical and accessible guide to Microsoft's Copilot Studio. Learn to create and deploy personalized AI solutions Read more...
title: [Last chance] Microsoft Copilot Studio Quick Start (worth $60) free download

description: Taking a shot at other AI browsers, Microsoft has unveiled Edge for Business as the first secure AI browser for enterprise. Read more...
title: Microsoft: Other AI browsers are not that good, Edge is the best option for businesses

description: Google DeepMind has officially launched Gemini 3 and Gemini 3 Deep Think, boasting record-breaking scores on major AI benchmarks. Read more...
title: Google announces Gemini 3 surpassing OpenAI's GPT-5.1 across key AI benchmarks

description: A new update has hit the Epic Games Store, and it finally allows users to gift games directly to friends, much like other stores on PC. Read more...
title: Epic Games Store users can now gift games to friends

description: Microsoft is bringing more recovery features to Windows 11 to help users restore PCs that cannot boot in no time. Read more...
title: Windows 11 is getting new recovery features

description: Microsoft has unveiled major updates for Copilot in Outlook announced at Ignite 2025, significantly enhancing email and calendar management. Read more...
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot in Outlook gains voice experience, new email and calendar features

description: Windows is evolving into an AI agentic OS, and Microsoft today at Ignite 2025 has given us an idea of what is going to be different in this new era of Windows. Read more...
title: Microsoft lists new features of next gen Windows 11 that is powered by AI and agents

description: Microsoft's new "IQ" unified intelligence layer, comprising Work IQ, Fabric IQ, and Foundry IQ, is designed to ground AI agents with deep enterprise context. Read more...
title: Microsoft introduces Work IQ and Fabric IQ, unified intelligence layers for agentic AI

description: Microsoft has unveiled its next-generation, in-house-developed ARM processor, the Cobalt 200, for Azure VMs, claiming up to 50% higher performance than its predecessor. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces Azure Cobalt 200, its next-generation ARM CPU for Azure Virtual Machines

description: Microsoft has launched Windows 365 for Agents, a new cloud PC solution tailored for AI agents to complete user tasks by interacting with applications on Windows or Linux. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces a new version of Windows 365 Cloud PCs specifically for AI agents

description: Microsoft is expanding AI capabilities on Windows with the public preview of native MCP support and the On-Device Registry (ODR) for managing AI agent connectors. Read more...
title: Microsoft is making AI agents a first-class component of Windows

description: New updates to Microsoft 365 Copilot include the integration of OpenAI's Sora 2 model for AI video generation within the Copilot Create experience and more. Read more...
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot adds Sora 2 for AI video creation, plus more new features

description: Microsoft is significantly expanding its Microsoft 365 Copilot capabilities by introducing dedicated AI agents for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Read more...
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot gains dedicated Word, Excel, and PowerPoint agents

description: Microsoft is expanding the accessibility and features of Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in response to Google's Gemini integration into Google Workspace. Read more...
title: Microsoft 365 users get free Copilot Chat integration in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint

description: Microsoft made a series of database announcements at the Ignite conference, including the general availability of SQL Server 2025. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces general availability of SQL 2025, Fabric Databases, and DocumentDB

description: Microsoft unveiled Azure HorizonDB at the Ignite conference, a new fully managed, scalable, and high-throughput PostgreSQL cloud database in private preview. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces Azure HorizonDB, a new PostgreSQL database

description: Microsoft has announced a major, expanded partnership with AI startup Anthropic, a rival to OpenAI, which includes an investment of up to $5 billion. Read more...
title: Anthropic's Claude AI models expand to Azure with $5 billion Microsoft investment

description: EA has shipped a new content update to Battlefield 6, giving the hit shooter a brand-new map, fresh weapons, aiming changes for controller players, and much more. Read more...
title: Battlefield 6 update brings Eastwood map, new weapons, aim-assist changes, and more

description: Microsoft has announced what new games Xbox Game Pass members will be able to jump into in the coming weeks. This includes Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault, Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden, and more. Read more...
title: Moonlighter 2, The Crew Motorfest, and more join Xbox Game Pass

description: Following its relaunch, Microsoft's Xbox Design Labs is now expanding its reach to more than two dozen countries worldwide. Read more...
title: Microsoft now ships custom-designed Xbox controllers to over two dozen countries via ESW

description: AMD's Radeon RX 9070 has 16GB VRAM and it is a great deal at the moment. The card competes with Nvidia 5070 and has four more gigs of memory. Read more...
title: Black Friday 2025 deal: AMD RX 9070 with 16GB VRAM, as good as Nvidia 5070, is under MSRP

description: Samsung is expected to launch Exynos-powered Galaxy S26 models in select regions, while keeping the Galaxy S26 Ultra exclusively on Snapdragon. Read more...
title: Exynos 2600 to power Samsung Galaxy S26 series but not everywhere

description: Google is bringing some of its Gemini AI features for free users of Google Vids, and its latest video generation model for Workspace users. Read more...

description: With his departure, reports suggest that there are very few designers left at Apple, raising questions about the future of Apple's design team. Read more...
title: Designer who introduced iPhone Air to the world no longer works for Apple

description: Microsoft has released a new ESU package update KB5072653 to fix KB5068781 ESU 0x800f0922 install error bug. Read more...
title: KB5072653: Microsoft outs new package to fix KB5068781 Windows 10 0x800f0922 install error

description: New Windows 11 Release Preview Channel Builds 26100.7296 and 26200.7296 under KB5070311 are now available for trying. Read more...
title: KB5070311: Windows 11 gets Drag Tray, File Explorer, Settings upgrades in release preview
